name: Syba CL-MOU23019 Wireless Optical Mouse
Features: [Battery-Low Alarming Function, 1000/1600 dpi Sensor Adjustable by Button, Built-in Dongle Storage Compartment Inside the Mouse, Powered by 1 AA Battery, ON/OFF Switch, Size: 4" x 1.25" x 2.25", Wireless Carrier Frequency: 2,402MHz - 2,480MHz, 16 Wireless Working Channels, Automatic Frequency Jumping, 2-way Communication Technology Speeds up Data Transmission Without Delay, With Latest Optical Technology, Mouse can be Operated on Many More Surfaces, Compliance with CE, and 1999/5/EC]
